constantValues: Collection of system users that routinely collaborate. Teams can be used to simplify record sharing and provide team members with common access to organization data when team members belong to different Business Units.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'Organization' adds the 'organizationId' attribute below to the 'Team' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

constantValues: Unique identifier of the organization associated with the team.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'BusinessUnit' adds the 'businessUnitId' attribute below to the 'Team' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

constantValues: Unique identifier of the business unit with which the team is associated.
Date and time when the team was created.
Date and time when the team was last modified.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'User' adds the 'createdBy' attribute below to the 'Team' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

constantValues: Unique identifier of the user who created the team.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'User' adds the 'modifiedBy' attribute below to the 'Team' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

constantValues: Unique identifier of the user who last modified the team.
Unique identifier of the data import or data migration that created this record.
Date and time that the record was migrated.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'User' adds the 'administratorId' attribute below to the 'Team' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

constantValues: Unique identifier of the user primary responsible for the team.
Information about whether the team is a default business unit team.
Pronunciation of the full name of the team, written in phonetic hiragana or katakana characters.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'User' adds the 'createdOnBehalfBy' attribute below to the 'Team' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

constantValues: Unique identifier of the delegate user who created the team.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'User' adds the 'modifiedOnBehalfBy' attribute below to the 'Team' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

constantValues: Unique identifier of the delegate user who last modified the team.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'Queue' adds the 'queueId' attribute below to the 'Team' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

constantValues: Unique identifier of the default queue for the team.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'Currency' adds the 'transactionCurrencyId' attribute below to the 'Team' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

constantValues: Unique identifier of the currency associated with the team.
Exchange rate for the currency associated with the team with respect to the base currency.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

arguments.explanation: This attribute 'teamType_display' is added to the 'Team' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'teamType'
arguments.name: teamType_display

constantValues: Shows the team template that is associated with the team.

arguments.explanation: This 'referencesA' relationship to the entity 'KnowledgeArticle' adds the 'regardingObjectId' attribute below to the 'Team' entity as a key
arguments.name: addedAttribute

constantValues: Choose the record that the team relates to.
Select whether the team will be managed by the system.
Shows the ID of the stage.
Shows the ID of the process.
